name: Moly kedvencelo plugin
author: bolint

sections.description:
With Moly kedvencelo plugin you can automaticly add moly.hu’s “Kedvenc” feature to your post.
A Moly kedvenc plugin segítségével könnyedén megjelenítheted a moly.hu kedvencelő funkcióját blogbejegyzéseidnél.

Options

The options page allows you to change the plugins display, style and location in the post.

Version history

Version 1.3.1

  • Bugfixes.

Version 1.3

  • Prepare the strings for localization.

Version 1.2

  • Added the settings form, for better usability.

Version 1.1

  • Update.

Version 1.00

  • Initial release version.
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents.
  2. Make sure you’re running WordPress version 2.3 or better. It won’t work with older versions.
  3. Upload the ‘moly-kedvencelo-plugin’ folder to your plugins directory (plugins/moly-kedvencelo-plugin).
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘plugins’ page in WP.
  5. See widget options to set your login name and the cover visibility.
sections.faq:
My theme/site appears not to like this plugin. It’s not displaying correctly.

  • In 99% of all cases where this happens the issue is caused by markup errors in the page where the plugin is used. Please validate your blog using validator.w3.org and fix any errors you may encounter.
